{"step_by_step_thinking": "Autoimmune disorders are conditions where the body's immune system mistakenly attacks its own cells. Ulcerative colitis is mentioned as an autoimmune disease in Document [16]. Grave's disease is an autoimmune disorder that affects the thyroid, as mentioned in Document [8]. Rheumatoid arthritis is also listed as an autoimmune disease in Document [8]. SLE, or Systemic Lupus Erythematosus, is also an autoimmune disease as mentioned in Document [24]. Therefore, all of the options are autoimmune disorders.", "answer_choice": "None of the above"}
